dict.acceptation: 曲调，曲子；和谐，调谐；语调；心情；
调整；使和谐，使一致；调整（频率）；为…调音；

sent.orig: Gezi, including Gezi tune and the improved tune the main tune the Taiwanese (Gezi) Opera music.
sent.trans: 歌仔戏音乐是以[歌仔调]和[改良调]所唱的[歌仔]为主要声腔。

sent.orig: You tune in one station and thus tune out all others.
sent.trans: 你调收一个电台，就调除了所有其他的台。

sent.orig: Snow-tube; can tune blood pressure. Sugar. Endocrine tune. Nerve transfer.
sent.trans: 还能调血压。血糖。调内分泌。调神经。

sent.orig: Most experts recommend that elementary school-age children tune in cartoons and tune out war coverage.
sent.trans: 大多数专家认为小学生应该多看些卡通电影，而不要看战争报道。

sent.orig: After the transfer: patchouli, incense tree Ami, tobacco tune tune smoked leather, cedar wood, amber.
sent.trans: 后调：广藿香、阿米香树、烟草调、烟熏皮革调、雪松木、琥珀。
